item.title: The Grammar of ggplot2
item.description: By now you should be fairly familiar with the R environment and decently familiar with tidyverse. You should be able to perform basic data manipulations, analyses and in general, understand the general concepts of working with data in R. To me personally, data visualisation is the funnest part of data science. Being able to visually communicate your findings in new and interesting ways is exciting and a joy when you have so many ways to customise your message.

item.title: Basic plots
item.description: To start, we will use the iris dataset that is built into tidyverse/ggplot2. To view the dataset, use the View() command like so: View(iris) Once we have this, letâ€™s setup a basic boxplot of some of the features of iris. The iris dataset is built into tidyverse/ggplot2.
